text: Bill Lang (born 18 March 1956) is a British rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Bill Lang (rower)
